io.cettia

Class DefaultServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cettia.DefaultServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action<ServerTransport>, Server
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteredServer

    public class DefaultServer
extends Object
implements Server
    Default implementation of Server.

    The following options are configurable.

    • setHeartbeat(int)
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultServer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sentence all()
      Returns a sentence that every socket in this server has to follow.
      Server all(Action<ServerSocket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving every socket in this server.
      Sentence byTag(String... names)
      Returns a sentence that the socket tagged with the given tags in this server have to follow.
      Server byTag(String[] names, Action<ServerSocket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given tags in this server.
      Server byTag(String name, Action<ServerSocket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given tag in this server.
      void on(ServerTransport transport) 
      Server onsocket(Action<ServerSocket> action)
      Adds a socket event handler to be called when the socket has been created in this server.
      void set_heartbeat(int _heartbeat)
      To speed up the protocol tests.
      void setHeartbeat(int heartbeat)
      A heartbeat interval in milliseconds to maintain a connection alive and prevent server from holding idle connections.

        public Server onsocket(Action<ServerSocket> action)

        Adds a socket event handler to be called when the socket has been created in this server.
        Specified by:
        onsocket in interface Server

      • setHeartbeat

        public void setHeartbeat(int heartbeat)
        A heartbeat interval in milliseconds to maintain a connection alive and prevent server from holding idle connections. The default is 20s and should be larger than 5s.

      • set_heartbeat

        public void set_heartbeat(int _heartbeat)
        To speed up the protocol tests. Not for production use.
